definition: Huzhu Tuzu autonomous county in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai
Huzhu Tuzu Autonomous County in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai
pinyin: Hu4 zhu4 Tu3 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: Huzhu Tuzu autonomous county in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai

sentences.english: As long as we unite and help each other, no one can conquer us.
sentences.chinese: 只要我们团结互助，谁也不能征服我们。

sentences.english: The energy in your job sector is all about unity and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 职责方面的能量都是关于团结互助的。

sentences.english: Overall farmers mutual aid was the best in the evaluation results of different organization models.
sentences.chinese: 不同组织模式总体评价结果为烟农互助组最佳。

sentences.english: Two people stuck in quick sand can't help each other.
sentences.chinese: 两个陷入流沙的人是不可能互助的。

sentences.english: Ss become less dependent on the teacher, and get used to helping and learning from each other.
sentences.chinese: 让学生减少对老师的依赖，习惯于彼此间互学互助。

sentences.english: And here it's much more supportive.
Unity and mutual assistance is the guarantee.
I think we may be prepared to work together in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我想也许未来畴昔我们能够互助。

sentences.english: It depends on how Foxconn and Apple work with the loc's government.
sentences.chinese: 其依赖于富士康和苹果公司如何与当地政府互助。

sentences.english: Post-modern mutualism could be the entrance of it.
sentences.chinese: 后现代互助论方向可能成为其未来的进路。

sentences.english: We will set up a sound mechanism for mutual assistance between urban and rural primary Party organizations.
sentences.chinese: 建立健全城乡党的基层组织互帮互助机制。

sentences.english: Members pay initial membership fee RMB 288.
sentences.chinese: 288元初始会员费，申请加入蓝虎健康互助计划。

sentences.english: The two men have signed treaties of friendship and cooperation on various levels.
sentences.chinese: 这两位政治强人曾数次签署不同层次的互助合作条约。

sentences.english: Rural mutual financial cooperative(RMFC) is a typical case of those innovations.
sentences.chinese: 农户资金互助合作社，就是这种创新的典型案例。

sentences.english: Public forces helping each other means the regulating effect of the third force .
sentences.chinese: 祉会互助，主要是发挥第三种力量的调节作用。

sentences.english: The organization had many obligations among which cooperation and mutual help were its aims.
sentences.chinese: 里父老的职责繁多，协作互助是父老僤的宗旨。

definition: to keep watch and defend one another (idiom, from Mencius); to join forces to defend against external aggressors/mutual help and protection
each does his utmost (idiom)/from each according to his means
when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

definition: mutual exchange of assistance (idiom)/to benefit from each other's strengths and make up each other's shortfalls/to reciprocate with material assistance/scratch each other's back
